      • capture

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage capture()
        Description copied from interface: Camera
        Immediately captures an image from the camera and returns it in it's native format. Fires the Camera.BeforeCapture and Camera.AfterCapture scripting events before and after.
        Specified by:
        capture in interface Camera
        Returns:

      • internalCapture

        protected abstract java.awt.image.BufferedImage internalCapture()

      • safeInternalCapture

        protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage safeInternalCapture()
        Wraps internalCapture() to ensure that a null image is never returned. Attempts to retry capture if the capture returns null and if no image can be captured returns a default image. Several of the low level camera drivers return null when there is a capture error, but these are often temporary and we would prefer not to have bad images returned. The retry is intended to smooth this out.
        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: Camera

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Location location,
                   double speed)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Movable
        Move the object to the Location at the feedRate.
        Specified by:
        moveTo in interface Movable
        Parameters:
        location - The Location to move to. If the movement should not include a particular axis, specify Double.NaN for that axis.
        speed - Feed rate is specified as a percentage of maximum feed between 0 and 1. 1 specifies maximum feed rate as defined by the machine while 0 defines the absolute minimum feed rate while still moving.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
